comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage New Jersey, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 30212818@N00
comment._content: My great grandfather worked for that mills. His family came over for Poland to be basically indentured servants to the Mill.  The Mill owned their housing and if they went on strike they were locked out from their lodges. I have a picture of my family with their belongs in the street outside their house.
